title: Petite Women's 26"/28"/30" Stretch Flare Jeans High Waisted Curvy Bootcut Denim Pants
description: [Specifical for PETITE Height]: Women's stretch flare jeans come in 3 inseam options: Short 26" for 4'9"-5'1", Petite 28" for 5'1"-5'5", and Regular 30" for 5'5"-5'9". Opt for a 1-2 inches shorter inseam than usual buy for capri or cropped jeans. Plus, to create a more elongated silhouette go for longer inseam denim pants than usual buy

[Super Stretch Denim]: The women's slim fit bootcut jeans are made from 4-way stretch and breathable cotton blend denim, for an easy feel requiring zero break-in time. With stretch and flexibility, the high waisted bell-bottom jeans move with you effortlessly—everywhere and every wear

[High rise Boot Cut Leg]: The women's denim pants feature a flattering high-rise silhouette to enhance the waistline and cover the tummy. Adopt classic bootcut, slim fit through the hips and thighs, and gradually widen from the knee to the hem, creating a balanced, elongated look that complements a variety of footwear styles

[Practical Details]: These high-waisted stretch jeans feature a zip fly, button closure, and belt loops for a better fit. The classic 4-pocket design adds practicality, while subtle fading and whiskering on the front legs and back hips create a trendy vintage look, blending style and functionality for any occasion

[Occasions]: These women's flare jeans are perfect for both casual and dressed-up looks. Pair them with a tucked-in blouse and heels for a chic office outfit, or wear them with a simple tee and ankle boots for weekend outings. The versatile flare design elongates the legs, making them ideal for work, business, nights out, home lounges, parties, shopping, or casual brunches.
